views Package¶

beach Module¶

seawidgets.views.beach.platgesdebalears_status(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Parse platgesdebalears.com to get beach status. Specific URL for the beach is stored in location object in the database.

The response is a JSON like this:

{
    "status": "estPermitido",
    "flagMessage": "Green flag",
    "date": "25/07/2013",
    "comment": "Opening service",
    "time": "10:00"
}

The result is cached 30 minutes.

beamon Module¶

seawidgets.views.beamon.latest(request, location, cameras, folder_suffix='', images_folder='latest_images')[source]¶

Get JSON of latest image of a list of cameras. It returns a JSON array. Example:

[
    {
        "image_tn": "http://www.socib.es/users/mobims/imageArchive/clm/sirena/clm_tn/latest_images/c01_snap.jpeg",
        "camera": "clm_c01",
        "image": "http://www.socib.es/users/mobims/imageArchive/clm/sirena/clm/latest_images/c01_snap.png",
        "time": "29/07/2013 14:10",
        "title": "Cala Millor - c01: 29/07/2013 14:10"
    },
    {
        "image_tn": "http://www.socib.es/users/mobims/imageArchive/clm/sirena/clm_tn/latest_images/c02_snap.jpeg",
        "camera": "clm_c02",
        "image": "http://www.socib.es/users/mobims/imageArchive/clm/sirena/clm/latest_images/c02_snap.png",
        "time": "29/07/2013 14:10",
        "title": "Cala Millor - c02: 29/07/2013 14:10"
    },
    {
        "image_tn": "http://www.socib.es/users/mobims/imageArchive/clm/sirena/clm_tn/latest_images/c03_snap.jpeg",
        "camera": "clm_c03",
        "image": "http://www.socib.es/users/mobims/imageArchive/clm/sirena/clm/latest_images/c03_snap.png",
        "time": "29/07/2013 14:10",
        "title": "Cala Millor - c03: 29/07/2013 14:10"
    }
]
Parameters:
  • location – location code
  • cameras – list of cameras separated by commas (or ‘all’ to show all cameras of this location)
  • folder_suffix – optional. Suffix for base folder (useful to get thumbnails)
  • images_folder – optional. Folder that contains images (useful to get resized images instead original)
Returns:

JSON array.
seawidgets.views.beamon.latest_mobile(request, location, cameras)[source]¶

Get JSON of latest image of a list of cameras. Select resized images.

Parameters:
  • location – location code
  • cameras – list of cameras separated by commas (or ‘all’ to show all cameras of this location)
seawidgets.views.beamon.latest_mobile_tiny(request, location, cameras)[source]¶

Get JSON of latest image of a list of cameras. Select thumbnail of resized images for mobile.

Parameters:
  • location – location code
  • cameras – list of cameras separated by commas (or ‘all’ to show all cameras of this location)
seawidgets.views.beamon.latest_tiny(request, location, cameras)[source]¶

Get JSON of latest thumbnail image of a list of cameras.

Parameters:
  • location – location code
  • cameras – list of cameras separated by commas (or ‘all’ to show all cameras of this location)
seawidgets.views.beamon.today(request, location, cameras, folder_suffix='')[source]¶

Get JSON of thumbnail images of a list of cameras. For each camera, it returns all images from yesterday and today. Example:

[
    {
        "image": "http://www.socib.es/users/mobims/imageArchive/clm/sirena/clm/c01/2013/07/28/clm_s_01_2013-07-28-04-00.png",
        "camera": "clm_c01",
        "title": "Cala Millor - c01: 28/07/2013 06:00"
    },
    {
        "image": "http://www.socib.es/users/mobims/imageArchive/clm/sirena/clm/c01/2013/07/28/clm_s_01_2013-07-28-05-00.png",
        "camera": "clm_c01",
        "title": "Cala Millor - c01: 28/07/2013 07:00"
    },
    {
        "image": "http://www.socib.es/users/mobims/imageArchive/clm/sirena/clm/c01/2013/07/28/clm_s_01_2013-07-28-06-00.png",
        "camera": "clm_c01",
        "title": "Cala Millor - c01: 28/07/2013 08:00"
    },
    {
        "image": "http://www.socib.es/users/mobims/imageArchive/clm/sirena/clm/c01/2013/07/28/clm_s_01_2013-07-28-07-00.png",
        "camera": "clm_c01",
        "title": "Cala Millor - c01: 28/07/2013 09:00"
    },
    {
        [...]
    },
    {
        "image": "http://www.socib.es/users/mobims/imageArchive/clm/sirena/clm/c01/2013/07/29/clm_s_01_2013-07-29-12-00.png",
        "camera": "clm_c01",
        "title": "Cala Millor - c01: 29/07/2013 14:00"
    },
    {
        "image": "http://www.socib.es/users/mobims/imageArchive/clm/sirena/clm/c01/2013/07/29/clm_s_01_2013-07-29-13-00.png",
        "camera": "clm_c01",
        "title": "Cala Millor - c01: 29/07/2013 15:00"
    }
]
Parameters:
  • location – location code
  • cameras – list of cameras separated by commas (or ‘all’ to show all cameras of this location)
  • folder_suffix – optional. Suffix for base folder (useful to get thumbnails)
seawidgets.views.beamon.today_tiny(request, location, cameras)[source]¶

Get JSON of thumbnail images of a list of cameras. For each camera, it returns all images from yesterday and today.

Parameters:
  • location – location code
  • cameras – list of cameras separated by commas (or ‘all’ to show all cameras of this location)

dash Module¶

seawidgets.views.dash.dash(request, zone_code='socib', location_code='', template='dash.html')[source]¶

Default page for seaboard-seawidgets

Parameters:
  • zone_code –
  • location_code –
  • template –
seawidgets.views.dash.status(request)[source]¶

Check if server and database is ok. If its ok, the seaboard panel will refresh the page.

seawidgets.views.dash.widget(request, name)[source]¶

Return widget template Only for development environment. In production, add the following line into virtualhost configuration:

AliasMatch ^/views/(.*).html /var/www/seaboard/static/widgets/$1/$1.html
Parameters:name – widget name.

radar Module¶

seawidgets.views.radar.animation(request, location_code)[source]¶

Get an animated gif for the observation of the radar for the last 24 hours. It gets the image from the cache (1 hour) or directly from thredds.

Parameters:location_code – for future use. Now, it will be used only for galfi.

rss Module¶

seawidgets.views.rss.read(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Parse RSS feed given inside ‘url’ get param. It returns a JSON array with the title and link of each entry. The result is cached for 2 hours.

sapo Module¶

seawidgets.views.sapo.latest(request, location)[source]¶

Get JSON array of SAPO forecast images of a given location. The images are previously croped (and cached for 24 hours). Example:

[
    {
        "image": "http://seaboardtest.socib.es/static/CACHE/img/sapo_snb00_hs06.jpg",
        "title": "Waves at 29/07/2013 08:00"
    },
    {
        "image": "http://seaboardtest.socib.es/static/CACHE/img/sapo_snb00_hs08.jpg",
        "title": "Waves at 29/07/2013 10:00"
    },
    {
        "image": "http://seaboardtest.socib.es/static/CACHE/img/sapo_snb00_hs10.jpg",
        "title": "Waves at 29/07/2013 12:00"
    },
    {
        "image": "http://seaboardtest.socib.es/static/CACHE/img/sapo_snb00_hs12.jpg",
        "title": "Waves at 29/07/2013 14:00"
    },
    {
        "image": "http://seaboardtest.socib.es/static/CACHE/img/sapo_snb00_hs14.jpg",
        "title": "Waves at 29/07/2013 16:00"
    },
    {
        "image": "http://seaboardtest.socib.es/static/CACHE/img/sapo_snb00_hs16.jpg",
        "title": "Waves at 29/07/2013 18:00"
    },
    {
        "image": "http://seaboardtest.socib.es/static/CACHE/img/sapo_snb00_hs18.jpg",
        "title": "Waves at 29/07/2013 20:00"
    },
    {
        "image": "http://seaboardtest.socib.es/static/CACHE/img/sapo_snb00_hs20.jpg",
        "title": "Waves at 29/07/2013 22:00"
    },
    {
        "image": "http://seaboardtest.socib.es/static/CACHE/img/sapo_snb00_hs22.jpg",
        "title": "Waves at 30/07/2013 00:00"
    },
    {
        "image": "http://seaboardtest.socib.es/static/CACHE/img/sapo_snb00_hs24.jpg",
        "title": "Waves at 30/07/2013 02:00"
    },
    {
        "image": "http://seaboardtest.socib.es/static/CACHE/img/sapo_snb00_hs26.jpg",
        "title": "Waves at 30/07/2013 04:00"
    },
    {
        "image": "http://seaboardtest.socib.es/static/CACHE/img/sapo_snb00_hs28.jpg",
        "title": "Waves at 30/07/2013 06:00"
    }
]

vessel Module¶

seawidgets.views.vessel.current_location(request)[source]¶

Read last line from posicion.proc file to get current location, speed, depth... It returs a JSON object. Example:

{
    "sog": "0.4",
    "long": "4.698",
    "depth": "2548.5",
    "cog": "346.7",
    "time": "12-07-2013 20:26:42",
    "lat": "38.836",
    "speed": "0.4"
}
seawidgets.views.vessel.current_meteo(request)[source]¶

Get last lecture of meteo station. It returns a JSON object. Example:

{
    "wind_speed": "1.613",
    "wind_speed_mean": "1.613",
    "air_pressure": "1016.424",
    "humidity": "87.49",
    "air_temperature": "19.415",
    "time": "11-06-2013 07:47:54",
    "wind_from_direction": "348.125",
    "sun_radiation": "0"
}
seawidgets.views.vessel.current_termosal(request)[source]¶

Get last lecture of termosal. It returns a JSON object. Example:

{
    "fluor": "0",
    "sea_water_temperature": "25.581",
    "sea_water_salinity": "37.333",
    "sea_water_electrical_conductivity": "56.846",
    "time": "12-07-2013 20:22:03"
}
seawidgets.views.vessel.location(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Get JSON arrays of position, speed, depth... taken every 10 minutes from yesterday and today. The result is cached for 25 minutes. Example:

{
    "sog": [],
    "long": [],
    "depth": [],
    "cog": [],
    "time": [],
    "lat": [],
    "speed": []
}
seawidgets.views.vessel.meteo(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Get JSON object with arrays of values from meteo station of last two days, taken every 10 minutes. Cached for 25 minutes. Example:

{
    "wind_speed": [],
    "wind_speed_mean": [],
    "air_pressure": [],
    "humidity": [],
    "air_temperature": [],
    "time": [],
    "wind_from_direction": [],
    "sun_radiation": []
}
seawidgets.views.vessel.termosal(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Get JSON object with arrays of values from termosal of last two days, taken every 10 minutes. Cached for 25 minutes. Example:

{
    "fluor": [],
    "sea_water_temperature": [],
    "sea_water_salinity": [],
    "sea_water_electrical_conductivity": [],
    "time": []
}
seawidgets.views.vessel.trajectory(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Get GeoJSON with the trajectory of the vessel in last two days.

weather_forecast Module¶

seawidgets.views.weather_forecast.forecast(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Get forecast from forecast.io (see https://developer.forecast.io/docs/v2) for a given location. The result is cached for 2 hours, to reduce calls to forecast API (the limit is 1.000 calls a day).

Parameters:location_code – location

weather_station Module¶

seawidgets.views.weather_station.station_info(request, location_code, format='html', template='weather_station/station_info.html')[source]¶

Get current data form weather station and minimum and maximum values for the last 24 hours. It search for all variables listed in STATION_VARIABLES (now: ‘air_temperature’, ‘wind_speed’, ‘air_pressure’, ‘relative_humidity’, ‘rain_accumulation’). It returns a JSON array with every variable. Example of data of a variable:

{
    "inputUnits": "°C",
    "display_name": "Air temperature",
    "min": {
        "value": 23.3,
        "time": "30/07/2013 06:44"
    },
    "max": {
        "value": 30.5,
        "time": "29/07/2013 12:26"
    },
    "current": {
        "value": 25.6,
        "time": "30/07/2013 11:59"
    },
    "standard_name": "air_temperature"
}
Parameters:
  • location_code –
  • format – html or json
  • template – for html format
seawidgets.views.weather_station.station_variable_info(request, location_code='pdp', variable='air_temperature')[source]¶

Get weather station data for just one variable.
